mapper:
<<<<<<< HEAD
select * from board
select * from board WHERE num = #{num}
insert into board ( num, writer,email,subject,passwd,reg_date,readcount,content,boardid) values (num.nextval,#{writer},#{email},#{subject},#{passwd},sysdate,0, #{content},0)
update board set writer=#{writer}, subject=#{subject}, email=#{email}, content=#{content}, passwd=#{passwd} where num=#{num}
delete from board where num=#{num}
select: select * from boardi order by boardnum asc
update: update boardi set subject = #{subject}, writer = #{writer}, contentq = #{contentq} where boardnum = #{boardnum}
